definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
consumer goods/means of livelihood/means of subsistence/documents relating to sb's life
to eke out a living/to live from hand to mouth/to drift aimlessly

sentences.english: Life won't always turn out the way you want.
sentences.chinese: 生活並不總會如你所願。

sentences.english: J: You have a very busy life. Lots of a week activies.
sentences.chinese: 你生活很充實啊，有很多的活動。

sentences.english: The cost of living figures out at $300。
According to Zhao, life in military campsites is not monotonous.
sentences.chinese: 趙峯表示，軍營生活並不單調。

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是這種失敗感使他決心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: Our supplies for this month are in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我們這個月的生活用品在櫥子裏。

sentences.english: He was always excited by his life and busy with where it was going.
sentences.chinese: 他總是爲他的生活而興奮，忙着它要去的地方。

sentences.english: Learn how to handle setbacks. Life is made of ups, downs, and disappointments.
sentences.chinese: 學會如何處理挫折，生活由順利，挫折和失望構成。

sentences.english: It turns out that you can be a committed nurse and have a social life.
sentences.chinese: 因爲那可以證明你可以是個有社交生活的帶罪護士。

sentences.english: How is your life, situation, etc?
sentences.chinese: 你的生活，情況等等如何？

sentences.english: Each day I live, the grace you give.
sentences.chinese: 每天的生活，禰都賜下恩典。

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，寫作的生活將繼續捕捉愛好它的“落網之魚”。

sentences.english: Without experiences in mind, he pledged he would never let his own two-year old son face such difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓不會讓自己兩歲的兒子生活得那麼艱辛。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們發現努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

sentences.english: I've spent my entire adult life doing battle with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 整個成年生活我都在和這個想法作鬥爭。

definition: lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt/fig. life's daily necessities
How are you getting by?/How's life?/contraction of 過得去|过得去, can get by/tolerably well/not too bad
lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy, vinegar, and tea/fig. life's daily necessities
pinyin: chai2 mi3 you2 yan2 jiang4 cu4 cha2
